languages.text: "Я допустила ошибку. Попала в засаду проклятых поклонников {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Была тяжело ранена. Леди Теодора пришла мне на выручку. На ее корабле мне оказали помощь, выходили после ранения. Все это произошло не так давно — я едва-едва оправилась от ран, когда на корабль напали культисты. Воистину, слуги зла не ведают покоя! Нет места, где мы были бы в безопасности от их козней".

traits.locale_text: "Я допустила ошибку. Попала в засаду проклятых поклонников {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Была тяжело ранена. Леди Теодора пришла мне на выручку. На ее корабле мне оказали помощь, выходили после ранения. Все это произошло не так давно — я едва-едва оправилась от ран, когда на корабль напали пираты. Воистину, слуги зла не ведают покоя! Нет места, где мы были бы в безопасности от их козней".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I made a mistake. In a moment of laxity, I was ambushed by the accursed followers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my aid and brought me aboard her ship, where her crew attended to me in my weakened state. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the cultists struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There is no place where we can be safe from their machinations."
languages.original_text: "Я допустила ошибку. Попала в засаду проклятых поклонников {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Была тяжело ранена. Леди Теодора пришла мне на выручку. На ее корабле мне оказали помощь, выходили после ранения. Все это произошло не так давно — я едва-едва оправилась от ран, когда на корабль напали культисты. Воистину, слуги зла не ведают покоя! Нет места, где мы были бы в безопасности от их козней".

traits.locale_text: "I made a mistake. I was ambushed by the accursed Chaos worshipers. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my rescue. I was offered assistance and nursed back to health. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the pirates struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There isn't a place where we could be safe from their machinations."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I made a mistake. I was ambushed by the accursed Chaos worshipers. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my rescue. I was offered assistance and nursed back to health. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the pirates struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There isn't a place where we could be safe from their machinations."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I made a mistake. In a moment of laxity, I was ambushed by the accursed followers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my aid and brought me aboard her ship, where her crew attended to me in my weakened state. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the cultists struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There is no place where we can be safe from their machinations."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我当时犯了个错误。我一时懈怠，遭到了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}邪恶仆从的伏击。我受了重伤，西奥多拉夫人前来救援。她把我带到了她的船上，让她的船员照顾虚弱不堪的我。这一切就发生在不久之前，因为那些异端分子袭击的时候，我的伤势几乎还没恢复过来。说真的，那些邪恶的仆从简直是一刻不停地筹谋！根本没有任何地方可以免遭他们的阴谋所害。”
languages.original_text: "I made a mistake. In a moment of laxity, I was ambushed by the accursed followers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my aid and brought me aboard her ship, where her crew attended to me in my weakened state. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the cultists struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There is no place where we can be safe from their machinations."

traits.locale_text: “我当时犯了个错误。我一时懈怠，遭到了{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}邪恶仆从的伏击。我受了重伤，西奥多拉夫人前来救援。她把我带到了她的船上，让她的船员照顾虚弱不堪的我。这一切就发生在不久之前，因为海盗袭击的时候，我的伤势几乎还没恢复过来。说真的，那些邪恶的仆从简直是一刻不停地筹谋！根本没有任何地方可以免遭他们的阴谋所害。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I made a mistake. In a moment of laxity, I was ambushed by the accursed followers of the Archenemy. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my aid and brought me aboard her ship, where her crew attended to me in my weakened state. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the pirates struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There is no place where we can be safe from their machinations."

languages.text: «Cometí un error. Me relajé un momento y fui emboscada por los malditos seguidores del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Quedé gravemente herida. Lady Theodora acudió en mi ayuda y me trajo a bordo de su nave, donde la tripulación cuidó de mí mientras estaba débil. Todo esto fue hace poco, apenas me había recuperado cuando los cultistas atacaron. ¡Es cierto que el mal no descansa! Ningún lugar está verdaderamente a salvo de sus conjuras».
languages.original_text: "I made a mistake. In a moment of laxity, I was ambushed by the accursed followers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my aid and brought me aboard her ship, where her crew attended to me in my weakened state. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the cultists struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There is no place where we can be safe from their machinations."

traits.locale_text: «Cometí un error. Me relajé un momento y fui emboscada por los malditos seguidores del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. Quedé gravemente herida. Lady Theodora acudió en mi ayuda y me trajo a bordo de su nave, donde la tripulación cuidó de mí mientras estaba débil. Todo esto fue hace poco, apenas me había recuperado cuando los piratas atacaron. ¡Es cierto que el mal no descansa! Ningún lugar está verdaderamente a salvo de sus conjuras».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は過ちを犯した。一瞬の気の緩みで、私は{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の呪われた信徒たちに待ち伏せされたのだ。私は重傷を負った。シオドーラ様が助けに来て、私を船へと連れて行ってくれ、そこで弱った私を介抱してくれた。教団が襲ってきたとき、私はやっと傷から回復したところだった。本当に悪の手先というものは休むことを知らないものだ！彼らの策略から安全な場所はどこにもないのだ」
languages.original_text: "I made a mistake. In a moment of laxity, I was ambushed by the accursed followers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my aid and brought me aboard her ship, where her crew attended to me in my weakened state. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the cultists struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There is no place where we can be safe from their machinations."

traits.locale_text: 「私は過ちを犯した。一瞬の気の緩みで、私は{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の呪われた信徒たちに待ち伏せされたのだ。私は重傷を負った。シオドーラ様が助けに来て、私を船へと連れて行ってくれ、そこで弱った私を介抱してくれた。教団が襲ってきたとき、私はやっと傷から回復したところだった。本当に悪の手先というものは休むことを知らないものだ！彼らの策略から安全な場所はどこにもないのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe einen Fehler begangen. In einem Moment der Unaufmerksamkeit wurde ich von den verfluchten Anhängern des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} überfallen. Ich wurde schwer verwundet. Lady Theodora kam mir zu Hilfe und brachte mich auf ihr Schiff, wo ihre Crew mich in meinem geschwächten Zustand versorgte. Das ist alles noch gar nicht lange her — ich hatte mich kaum von meinen Wunden erholt, als die Kultisten zuschlugen. Die Diener des Bösen kennen wahrlich keine Rast! Wir sind nirgendwo vor ihren Machenschaften sicher."
languages.original_text: "I made a mistake. In a moment of laxity, I was ambushed by the accursed followers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my aid and brought me aboard her ship, where her crew attended to me in my weakened state. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the cultists struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There is no place where we can be safe from their machinations."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einen Fehler begangen. In einem Moment der Unaufmerksamkeit wurde ich von den verfluchten Anhängern des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} überfallen. Ich wurde schwer verwundet. Lady Theodora kam mir zu Hilfe und brachte mich auf ihr Schiff, wo ihre Crew mich in meinem geschwächten Zustand versorgte. Das ist alles noch gar nicht lange her — ich hatte mich kaum von meinen Wunden erholt, als die Piraten zuschlagen. Die Diener des Bösen kennen wahrlich keine Rast! Wir sind nirgendwo vor ihren Machenschaften sicher."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai commis une erreur. Dans un moment de relâchement, j'ai été prise par surprise par les maudits adorateurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. J'ai été gravement blessée, et dame Théodora est venue à mon secours. Elle m'a fait monter dans son vaisseau, où son équipage s'est occupé de moi. C'est encore relativement récent. J'avais à peine récupéré de mes blessures lorsque les cultistes ont attaqué. Les serviteurs du mal ne connaissent vraiment aucune limite ! Il n'existe aucun lieu à l'abri de leurs machinations. »
languages.original_text: "I made a mistake. In a moment of laxity, I was ambushed by the accursed followers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my aid and brought me aboard her ship, where her crew attended to me in my weakened state. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the cultists struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There is no place where we can be safe from their machinations."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai commis une erreur. Dans un moment de relâchement, j'ai été prise par surprise par les maudits adorateurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. J'ai été gravement blessée, et dame Théodora est venue à mon secours. Elle m'a fait monter dans son vaisseau, où son équipage s'est occupé de moi. C'est encore relativement récent. J'avais à peine récupéré de mes blessures lorsque les pirates ont attaqué. Les serviteurs du mal ne connaissent vraiment aucune limite ! Il n'existe aucun lieu à l'abri de leurs machinations. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bir hata ettim. Gardımı indirdiğim bir anda {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} melun müritleri beni pusuya düşürdü. Feci hâlde yaralanmıştım. Leydi Theodora yardımıma koşup beni gemisine kabul etti. Zayıf düştüğüm bu anlarımda beni tedavi eden de kendisinin mürettebatı oldu. Bu olayların üzerinden çok geçmedi. Tarikatçılar saldırdığında yaralarım henüz iyileşmişti. Şerrin hizmetkârları sahiden dur durak bilmiyor! Çevirdikleri dolaplardan saklanmak mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: "I made a mistake. In a moment of laxity, I was ambushed by the accursed followers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. I was badly wounded. Lady Theodora came to my aid and brought me aboard her ship, where her crew attended to me in my weakened state. It all happened not too long ago — I had barely recovered from my wounds when the cultists struck. Truly the servants of evil know no rest! There is no place where we can be safe from their machinations."

traits.locale_text: "Bir hata ettim. Gardımı indirdiğim bir anda {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın melun müritleri bana pusu kurdu. Feci hâlde yaralanmıştım. Leydi Theodora yardımıma koşup beni gemisine kabul etti. Zayıf düştüğüm bu anlarımda beni tedavi eden onun mürettebatı oldu. Bu olayların üzerinden çok geçmedi. Tarikatçılar saldırdığında yaralarım henüz iyileşmişti. Şerrin hizmetkârları sahiden dur durak bilmiyor! Çevirdikleri dolaplardan saklanmak mümkün değil."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
